divs: sighting detailsi was rolling my trash can out to the street around 8:15 - 8:20 pm. it was just after dark and a few of the brighter stars\planets were just becoming visible. there were no clouds. i noticed what i first thought to be an unusually bright star or planet and i noticed a smaller reddish star next to it that i assume was probably mars. i stopped rolling my trash to focus on it and it was so bright ( much brighter than the north star ) that i started trying to remember if there was a celestial event happening with a planet or something. then the light increased in size and brightness maybe to the size of a penny held with outstretched hand. the object then began to travel, i immediately recognized the motion because i still had the other star as a reference point. the brightness dimmed to about average star brightness as it traveled and it quickly seemed to be ascending as it quickly got smaller and vanished completely.
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Birmingham
There were no other sightings in Birmingham on or around May 27th 2013
Summary: Stationary then increased brightness, started moving then appeared to ascend until gone
